definition: To draw in or take in a substance or fluid through a specialized mechanism, typically involving suction. This action is commonly associated with the removal of dirt, dust, or liquid from a surface or object.

examples.german: Die Staubsauger saugen den Staub auf.
examples.english: The vacuum cleaners suck up the dust.

examples.german: Sie saugt den Saft aus der Orange.
examples.english: She sucks the juice out of the orange.

examples.german: Die Pumpe saugt das Wasser aus dem Brunnen.
examples.english: The pump draws the water out of the well.
